name: Seasons Of Life (wolffrog)
description:
This is a visual demo game for Unity. I wanted to create a story that includes the different aspects of Life, split into Four Seasons, along with growing/shrinking and the different things that come and pass.

Controls

- Move

- Sprint

=====================================

Attributions

Thank you so much for all your generousity in providing these assets free of charge! These assets were very valuable in getting me started!
